body:
Hi,

So this is a thread where you can talk about games on Steam, find new friends and play with them.
Hopefully, if we get enough people we can create a Avicus Steam group. Start the discussion by saying which games you play etc. 
Perhaps we can get some Avicus players to join Steam!

My username is Caperz if anyone wants to add me.
